lg.l: It's winter now, and the nights are cold
And we try to keep each other warm
But last night you looked though me
I fall in love with you
Every day
From the start
Big, yellow moon is lighting our world tonight
And I walk, but I can't swallow my tears any more
And I know
You're fool as me
And we both have fears and anger
And it's hard, to escape from this madness
and it's hard to forget all this troubles
But tonight
Just this one time dance with me
Let me put my head on your shoulder
Close your eyes, close your eye and dance with me
And forget
Forget everything but me
And now
That the whole world disappeared
Lets dance
